languages.text: {n}Кассия отводит взгляд.{/n} "Ваши слова справедливы, но поверьте... я очень сожалею о случившемся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия отводит взгляд.{/n} "Ваши слова справедливы, но поверьте... я очень сожалею о случившемся".

languages.text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

languages.text: {n}カシアは目をそらす。{/n}「あなたの言葉はもっともですが、信じてください…ここで起こったことを深く後悔しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは目をそらす。{/n}「あなたの言葉はもっともですが、信じてください…ここで起こったことを深く後悔しています」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅移开了视线。{/n}“你的话很公平。不过，相信我……刚刚发生的事情，我真的很抱歉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅移开了视线。{/n}“你的话很公平。不过，相信我……刚刚发生的事情，我真的很抱歉。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia aparta la mirada.{/n} «Sus palabras son justas, pero, aun así, créame... lamento profundamente lo que ha ocurrido aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia aparta la mirada.{/n} «Sus palabras son justas, pero, aun así, créame... lamento profundamente lo que ha ocurrido aquí».

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt weg.{/n} "Eure Worte sind gerecht, und doch, glaubt mir ... doch bereue ich zutiefst, was hier geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt weg.{/n} "Eure Worte sind gerecht, und doch, glaubt mir ... doch bereue ich zutiefst, was hier geschehen ist."

languages.text: {n}Cassia détourne le regard.{/n} « Vos paroles sont justes, et pourtant, croyez-moi... Je regrette sincèrement ce qu'il s'est produit ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia détourne le regard.{/n} « Vos paroles sont justes, et pourtant, croyez-moi... Je regrette sincèrement ce qu'il s'est produit ici. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Dediklerin hakkaniyete uygun ancak... Yemin ederim ki burada olanlardan bin pişmanım."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away.{/n} "Your words are fair, and yet, trust me... I deeply regret what took place here."
